capabilities.capability: Removes IP from security group in AWS

entryPoint.name: AWS Blocked Traffic - Reset - Kentik - Example

inputs.name: sourceIP
inputs.description: IP to remove from security group in AWS

inputs.name: awsEC2Adapter
inputs.description: The AWS EC2 adapter to use in job

inputs.name: awsSecurityGroup
inputs.description: The AWS security group from which to remove IP address provided

name: AWS Blocked Traffic - Reset - Kentik - Example
overview: Workflow that is used to remove source IP from security group in AWS to reset data for AWS Blocked Traffic - Kentik - Example automation
